@rosieluff Mine took three days to be fixed but there was a weekend in the middle. Hope they've got to you by now!
@rosieluff I had the same issue all over the weekend! Fixed last night. I was bereft!
@virginmedia It's just come back on...it's a Halloween Treat. Thanks!
@virginmedia turns out its still broken, engineer not available until next Monday. Maybe a spook in the system?
@virginmedia Thanks yes. I had a text today to say it had been fixed, will check when I get home from work this evening
@virginmedia No internet since Friday afternoon, recorded message says you're working to fix it, do you have any update?
